com.team08storyapp

Class Audio

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.team08storyapp.Audio

  • public class Audio
extends java.lang.Object
    +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ ++++++ This class is used for future implementations (Fake Class)++++++ +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ Audio is a model class representing an soundtrack or recording that can be used in an Annotation on a StoryFragment in a Story or as an illustration on a StoryFragment in a Story. An photo has the following properties:
    • Audio Id is to uniquely identify the Audio.
    • Audio Name is the name the user gave to the audio track.
    • Audio the audio the reader set in Annotation.
    • Encoded audio is the audio encoded for storing it in a file or on a webservice.
    • Audio Permissions is the track's permission for read only
    These properties are able to be accessed through the constructor or through public getters/setters.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0 November 8, 2013
    Author:
    Michele Paulichuk, Alice Wu, Ana Marcu, Jarrett Toll, Jiawei Shen
    See Also:
    Story, StoryFragment, Annotation
